title: BRIEF-Datametrex Announces Management Changes, Appoints Marshall Gunter As CEO
text:
BRIEF-Datametrex Announces Management Changes, Appoints Marshall Gunter As CEO

Stock Markets 21 minutes ago (Oct 09, 2019 08:31)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Datametrex Announces Management Changes, Appoints Marshall Gunter As CEO Oct 9 (Reuters) - Datametrex AI Ltd : * DATAMETREX ANNOUNCES MANAGEMENT CHANGES * SAYS CEO ANDREW RYU RESIGNED * APPOINTED NEXALOGY'S CEO, MARSHALL GUNTER, AS NEW CHIEF EXECUTIVE OFFICER OF DATAMETREX * JEFF STEVENS HAS STEPPED DOWN AS CHIEF OPERATING OFFICER, BUT WILL CONTINUE AS PRESIDENT * ANDREW RYU WILL ASSUME POSITION AS COMPANY'S CHAIRMAN

BRIEF-Datametrex Announces Management Changes, Appoints Marshall Gunter As CEO
description: BRIEF-Datametrex Announces Management Changes, Appoints Marshall Gunter As CEO
